verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
So, lift high the banner of love,
Hallelujah!
Song the trumpets of war.
Christ has given us the victory,
Hallelujah!
Jericho must fall!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the name of God the Father,
In the name of Jesus His Son,
And in the name of the Spirit,
We will fight till we are called one!
